data.title: VPL Picks: Spy Thrillers - Vancouver Public Library
data.meta_description:
VPL Picks: Spy Thrillers by vpl_booksjustforyou11 - a staff-created list : The Spy Thriller, a subgenre of thriller fiction, features secret agents and espionage. Usually action-packed,  spy thrillers often follow a secret agent racing against the clock to thwart or uncover an enemy’s plans.

Get started with these titles carefully selected by the reading specialists at Vancouver Public Library. If you would like a personalized reading list, please use the Books Just For You service at https://www.vpl.ca/readnext.
data.text:
Set in 1963 Berlin, this is a riveting, sophisticated spy novel from master of the genre Joseph Kanon. "The suspense builds quietly, almost stealthily, before tightening its grip." Kirkus reviews Set in 1963 Berlin, this is a riveting, sophisticated spy novel from master of the genre Joseph Kanon. "The suspense builds quietly, almost stealthily, before tightening its grip." Kirkus reviews Show less

This gripping, stand-alone thriller by espionage master Herron uncovers intrigue and corruption in the British secret service, from Berlin in the 1990s to the Cabinet office today. This gripping, stand-alone thriller by espionage master Herron uncovers intrigue and corruption in the British secret service, from Berlin in the 1990s to the Cabinet office today. Show less

This globe-trotting spy thriller takes place mostly in the present, but has roots in the Cold War era, and features fearless and complex female spies. This globe-trotting spy thriller takes place mostly in the present, but has roots in the Cold War era, and features fearless and complex female spies. Show less

“The Traitor delivers everything fans of spy fiction could want: an absorbing plot, shadowy characters, page-gripping tension." --- The Washington Post “The Traitor delivers everything fans of spy fiction could want: an absorbing plot, shadowy characters, page-gripping tension." --- The Washington Post Show less

This “promising subversion of the classic espionage novel” follows 25-year-old Vera Kelly to Buenos Aires, sent there by the CIA to infiltrate a rumored KGB cell. This “promising subversion of the classic espionage novel” follows 25-year-old Vera Kelly to Buenos Aires, sent there by the CIA to infiltrate a rumored KGB cell. Show less

This top-notch thriller by bestselling author Steinhauer pits a disenchanted agent against multinational corporations. This top-notch thriller by bestselling author Steinhauer pits a disenchanted agent against multinational corporations. Show less

A riveting thriller featuring legendary Gabriel Allon of the Israeli secret service, who is called back to the Vatican to help investigate the mysterious death of the pope himself. A riveting thriller featuring legendary Gabriel Allon of the Israeli secret service, who is called back to the Vatican to help investigate the mysterious death of the pope himself. Show less

A fast-paced thriller by Charles Cumming, who has often been compared to John le Carré. Former MI6 officer Kell finds himself morally conflicted after he jumps at the opportunity to get revenge against the Kremlin. A fast-paced thriller by Charles Cumming, who has often been compared to John le Carré. Former MI6 officer Kell finds himself morally conflicted after he jumps at the opportunity to get revenge against the Kremlin. Show less

Vintage Len Deighton, this spy thriller about the defection of a high-ranking Soviet official features an intricate plot and unfailing suspense to the final nightmarish climax. Vintage Len Deighton, this spy thriller about the defection of a high-ranking Soviet official features an intricate plot and unfailing suspense to the final nightmarish climax. Show less

An expertly-crafted espionage novel by Stella Rimington, former Director General of MI5, in which a deadly terrorist threat draws British intelligence officer Liz Carlyle into a dangerous pursuit. An expertly-crafted espionage novel by Stella Rimington, former Director General of MI5, in which a deadly terrorist threat draws British intelligence officer Liz Carlyle into a dangerous pursuit. Show less

A prize-winning, gripping spy novel set in 1975. A Viet Cong spy is engaged in a surveillance mission for a Vietnamese army general and his compatriots as they start a new life in Los Angeles. A prize-winning, gripping spy novel set in 1975. A Viet Cong spy is engaged in a surveillance mission for a Vietnamese army general and his compatriots as they start a new life in Los Angeles. Show less

All copies in use. Availability details Holds: 92 on 17 copies

This fast-paced suspense story by spy thriller master Flynn, follows Mitch Rapp on his first mission chasing down terrorists. This fast-paced suspense story by spy thriller master Flynn, follows Mitch Rapp on his first mission chasing down terrorists. Show less

A masterwork of suspense, intrigue, and dangerous machinations of the human heart, in which the course of World War II is in the hands of a German spy. A masterwork of suspense, intrigue, and dangerous machinations of the human heart, in which the course of World War II is in the hands of a German spy. Show less

An acclaimed international spy thriller pitting an ambitious American rookie agent against a gorgeous Russian intelligence officer. An acclaimed international spy thriller pitting an ambitious American rookie agent against a gorgeous Russian intelligence officer. Show less

In this very British spy thriller a Canadian gets caught up in an international spy ring. In this very British spy thriller a Canadian gets caught up in an international spy ring. Show less

All copies in use. Availability details Holds: 1 on 1 copy

A chilling tale of espionage, superstition and betrayal by one of the genre masters. A chilling tale of espionage, superstition and betrayal by one of the genre masters. Show less

This spy thriller about one man's efforts to thwart the forces of world domination keeps the reader guessing until the very end. This spy thriller about one man's efforts to thwart the forces of world domination keeps the reader guessing until the very end. Show less

A classic tale of Cold War spy thriller in which "Jackal" is the code name of a professional killer hired to assassinate French President Charles de Gaulle. A classic tale of Cold War spy thriller in which "Jackal" is the code name of a professional killer hired to assassinate French President Charles de Gaulle. Show less

A gripping spy technothriller with CIA analyst Jack Ryan searching frantically for a Soviet submarine whose captain may or may not want to defect. A gripping spy technothriller with CIA analyst Jack Ryan searching frantically for a Soviet submarine whose captain may or may not want to defect. Show less
